body:
Hello everyone,
I am happy to announce that I was recently promoted to Director of Staff for the time being (until Howsie comes back). No, it's not permanent; however it's in my best interest to officially oversee the whole staff team and make appropriate changes. 

I cannot wait to discover what the future holds, and let's see if we can perfect the staff team o//
Thanks for your attention.

Jozz.
body_tagged:

Thanks for your attention.

replies.body: Quick question : I'm a long time Avicus / Mczone player, and I'm pretty concerned about my favorite server (avicus) struggling. Can we get some kind of official "State of the server / Future" for avicus? Lots if threads, but not lots of reassurance . Would be a great step if we could get some real information of where we are and where the leadership is taking the network. - thanks.
